alert.note: Alert for Albany; Rensselaer; Saratoga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:48PM EST until January 27 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Troy. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Minor flood stage. Water floods onto the Mohawk Wharf in Village of Waterford. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Troy Flood Stage: 21.5 Observed Stage at Fri 9 pm: 21.2 Forecast: Sat 1 am 21.5 Sat 7 am 21.4 Sat 1 pm 20.8 Sat 7 pm 20.4 Sun 1 am 20.0 Sun 7 am 19.7 Sun 1 pm 19.4 Sun 7 pm 19.2 Mon 1 am 19.0 Mon 7 am 18.9 Mon 1 pm 18.9 &&
